items.raw_string: Name of donor: (1) Conservative  Friends of Israel (2) Israeli Ministry of Foreign AffairsAddress of donor: (1) PO Box 72288, London SW1P 9LB; (2) 9 Yitzhak Rabin Blvd., Kiryat Ben-Gurion, Jerusalem 9103001Amount of donation (or estimate of the probable value): (1) Flight from Cyprus to Israel and flight from Israel to the UK, VIP airport service, accommodation and hospitality with an approximate value of £2,300 (2) bus travel to a value of £650Destination of visit: Israel and the West BankDate of visit: 12-17 February 2017Purpose of visit: To meet political leaders, commentators, business figures and others to discuss the prospects for a negotiated settlement between Israel and the Palestinians.
